ai.desc: Cycles #wFirebolt or #wIrradiate -> #wFlare.
ai.notes: Dazed status cards go into the draw pile. Debuffs from #wIrradiate are randomly picked from Weak, Frail, Strength -1, Dexterity -1, and Focus -1 (if the player has orb slots).

ai.desc: Cycles #wFirebolt or #wIrradiate -> #wFlare.
ai.notes: Dazed status cards go on top of the draw pile. Debuffs from #wIrradiate are randomly picked from Weak, Frail, Strength -1, Dexterity -1, and Focus -1 (if the player has orb slots).

ai.desc: Starts with 60-40 split between #wZap and #wRain. Afterwards, move is based on the last two moves: NL (1) If the last move was #wRain, 70-30 split between #wZap and #wGust. NL (2) If the last move was #wGust, 60-40 split between #wZap and #wRain. NL (3) If the last two moves were both #wZap, 60-40 split between #wRain and #wGust. NL (4) Otherwise, 30-40-30 split between #wZap, #wRain, and #wGust.

NL (4) Otherwise, 30-40-30 split between #wZap, #wRain, and #wGust.

Starts with #wHammer #wof #wthe #wFirelord, then #wFiery #wWrath or #wSummon #wOrb, then the other. Afterwards, bases its next move on its previous two moves, as follows: NL If the last two moves were both #wFiery #wWrath or #wSummon #wOrb, uses #wRain #wof #wFire. NL If the last two moves were both #wRain #wof #wFire, uses #wFiery #wWrath or #wSummon #wOrb. NL If the last move was #wRain #wof #wFire, uses #wSummon #wOrb or #wRain #wof #wFire. NL Otherwise, uses #wFiery #wWrath or #wRain #wof #wFire. NL NL #wSummon #wOrb can only be used if there is space to summon and summons a second minion starting with the third use (or starting with the first use in the fight with two Orbs of Fire and the Firelord).
ai.notes: Innate #uCleanse 1, #uFlourishing #uFlame. Burn status cards go into the discard pile.

ai.desc: Cycles #wGathering #wFlames or #wSpear #wThrust -> the other -> #wRitual #wStrike or #wProtecting #wSlam. After the first use, #wGathering #wFlame gives Party Strength 1 and Heal 3 instead of Ritual and Strength.

Repeats #wPortal until 5 elementals have been summoned. Afterwards uses #wStrengthening #wRestoration, then #wChaotic #wEnergies, then repeats #wElemental #wBlast. NL NL Elementals are randomly chosen from Orb of Fire, Living Stormcloud, Opulent Offering, and Shimmering Mirage, with at most two of each appearing over the course of the fight.

Repeats #wPortal until 5 elementals have been summoned. Afterwards uses #wStrengthening #wRestoration, then #wChaotic #wEnergies, then repeats #wElemental #wBlast. NL NL Elementals are randomly chosen from Orb of Fire, Living Stormcloud, Opulent Offering, and Shimmering Mirage, with at most two of each appearing over the course of the fight.

Repeats #wPortal until 6 elementals have been summoned. Afterwards uses #wStrengthening #wRestoration, then #wChaotic #wEnergies, then repeats #wElemental #wBlast. NL NL Elementals are randomly chosen from Orb of Fire, Living Stormcloud, Opulent Offering, and Shimmering Mirage, with at most two of each appearing over the course of the fight.

Cycles #wCall #wGolem -> #wGolem #wShield or #wLoose #wMaterials -> the other. NL NL Golem summoned by #wCall #wGolem are: NL (1) Tar and Ruby NL (2) Stone and Ruby NL (3) War NL (4) Ruby and War (repeated). NL NL Summoned golems start with half HP and negative Strength (1 for Tar, 4 for Ruby, 3 for Stone, 10 for War).

Cycles #wCall #wGolem -> #wGolem #wShield or #wLoose #wMaterials -> the other. NL NL Golem summoned by #wCall #wGolem are: NL (1) Tar and Ruby NL (2) Stone and Ruby NL (3) War NL (4) Ruby and War (repeated). NL NL Summoned golems start with half HP and negative Strength (1 for Tar, 4 for Ruby, 3 for Stone, 10 for War).

Cycles #wCall #wGolem -> #wGolem #wShield or #wLoose #wMaterials -> the other. NL NL Summoned golems start with half HP and negative Strength (1 for Tar, 4 for Ruby, 3 for Stone, 10 for War).

Cycles #wCall #wGolem -> #wGolem #wShield or #wLoose #wMaterials -> the other. NL NL Golems summoned by #wCall #wGolem are: NL (1) Tar and Ruby NL (2) Stone and Ruby NL (3) War and Mud NL (4) Ruby and War (repeated). NL NL Summoned golems start with half HP and negative Strength (1 for Tar, 4 for Ruby, 3 for Stone, 10 for War, 3 for Mud).

Cycles #wClaw #wSwipe, #wWing #wSweep, and #wMolten #wFrenzy, with the first move a 40-40-20 split and the second move a 50-50 split between the two remaining moves. When HP is half or below, uses #uBurning #uTempest once (and causes the current move cycle to only include two of the other moves instead of three).

Cycles #wTail #wSlam -> #wBreath #wWeapon -> #wEmpowering #wRoar -> #wClaw #wand #wBite. Starting with turn 4, uses #wTurn #wto #wGold if it wasn't used the previous turn and the player does not have #uWraith #uForm debuff.
ai.notes: Innate #uArtifact 1. Dazed status cards go into the discard pile
